summary: Adds 8 additional clothes items for Hearthfires adopted children.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ffff00]The mod is no longer supported by the author.
Feel free to use my assets in your mods/ports with a proper credit.
Enjoy your game and have a nice day :)[/color]


I like vanilla kids and their vanilla clothing for they look really childlike.
There are a lot of mods changing children and their outfits, but I find most of them rather... pedophile ?_? (still i bow to the authors' skill and great work)
So I made several new textures for the same vanilla model.
Thanks to tanishin's scripts I now managed to add the new textures without replacing the existine ones, so you may use this mod with any other clothing replacer.

[color=#ffff00]Main[/color]
Main file adds 8 new children's clothes items with new textures to Radiant Raiments store in Solitude.
The ESP is based on on [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54580/]Additional Children Clothes by [b]tanishin[/b][/url][size=2], which is required for the mod to work properly.
It also requires[color=#ffff00] [/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29249/]Hearthfire multiple adoptions[/url] mod.
The textures in the main mod are 2048.

[/size]There are also several optional files:

[color=#ffff00]Hearthfire Only ESP[/color]
Contains an esp file for those, who do not use Hearthfire multiple adoptions.

[color=#ffff00]New Textures 1024[/color]
Contains a lighter version of the new textures.

[color=#ffff00]Old Textures[/color]
Replaces the textures with the older versions.
The names of the items ingame remain the same, so it may seem rather awkward :)



1) Install  [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54580/]Additional Children Clothes by [b]tanishin[/b][/url][size=2] [color=#ff0000](mandatory)[/color]
[/size]2) Istall [color=#ffff00] [/color][color=#ffff00][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29249/]Hearthfire multiple adoptions[/url] (opionally)
[/color]3) Install the Main plugin (activate it in NMM or manually unpack the archive in Skyrim/Data folder and check the esp file in launcher)
4) Download and install any optional files that you need and replace the existing files.

[color=#ffff00]Both ACC and HMA mods require a new game started.
However I launched them on an saved game together with HF itself - it worked.[/color]


All children's clothes may be bought in Radiant Raiments shop in Solitude.



--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[color=#ffff00]Older versions[/color]
This mod [color=#52a2d9]replaces[/color] textures of existing child's clothes in Skyrim and Hearthfires DLC. There are five separate optional replacers.

[b][color=#52a2d9]Vanilla Clothes Replacer[/color][/b]

Replaces the original textures of three children's clothes variants, both for boys and girls.

[b][color=#52a2d9]North Child [/color][/b]

Replaces the original textures of two child's outfits added in Hearthfires DLC for woolen variants.

[b][color=#52a2d9]Night Child[/color][/b]

Replaces the original textures of two child's outfits added in Hearthfires DLC for dark-colored variants.

[b][color=#52a2d9]Royal Child[/color][/b]

Replaces the original textures of two child's outfits added in Hearthfires DLC for fancy embroidered variants.

[b][color=#52a2d9]Explorer Child[/color][/b]

Replaces the original textures of two child's outfits added in Hearthfires DLC for two more variants.

[color=#ffff00]You can use only one HF file + vanilla clothes replacer.
Or you can combine different textures from these files - for this you'll need to name files appropriately and place them in corresponding folders.[/color]



[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/contents/Images/icons/icon-report-h.png[/img] The textures in the replacer are far from being perfect and hilghly detailed. They are just made to look pretty. So there are visible seams on them etc.
Also all the vanilla clothes share the same normal map, which also causes some minor defects.


- tanishin for his great Additional Children Clothes resource
- TMPhoenix for Hearthfire multiple adoptions
- Bethesda for creating TES games
- Adobe for creating Photoshop
- All of you for your attention :)
author: jacknifelee
